Title: Relates to the prohibition of fees or surcharges with accepted forms of payment; repealer
Summary: Prohibits sellers from imposing fees or surcharges with accepted forms of payment.
LawCode: Add ยง392-k, rpld ยง518, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting fees or surcharges with accepted forms of payment; and to repeal section 518 of such law relating thereto
